Talents.Name: Foolproof Plan
Talents.Description: A Crystal Barrier blocks all damage, shattering when 200 or more damage is taken from a single source, dealing 100% of <Operator Name>'s ATK as Arts damage to all enemies within attack range and stunning them for 1s, reforms after 8s

Talents.Name: Shrouded Strength
Talents.Description: 50% chance to recover 1 SP when attacked
